Connector - Class in DBAccess
The purpose of the Connector class is to establish a connection to the SQL database so that the information within it can be accessed and modified.

countOrdersById(int) - Static method in class DBAccess.OrderMapper
the countOrdersById method is exclusively used for the admin's customer page where all customers in the database can be seen.

createCustomer(Customer) - Static method in class DBAccess.CustomerMapper
The createCustomer method adds a customer to the database with the Customer object that is used as an argument in the method.

Customer - Class in FunctionLayer
The purpose of Customer is to work as a template for the customer information that is sent to and retrieved from the database.

CustomerMapper - Class in DBAccess
The purpose of CustomerMapper is to interact with the database and retrieve or alter customer information in it through select, insert, update and delete methods.
